name: writ
content:
writ noun
(DOCUMENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ]
  law
  specialized a legal document from a law court that tells you that you will be involved in a legal process and explains what you must do: There have been at least seven writs issued against him for late payment of bills. She has served a writ for libel on the newspaper (= she has delivered it to them officially).
